      Methods in Heroes_Villains.inventory with parameters of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Inventory.addItem(Item item)
      Adds an item to the inventory by checking if an item with the same id already exists and if it does the count of the existing item increases else the item is added to the inventory array list.
